alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 4:37AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Evangeline, south central Avoyelles and northeastern St. Landry Parishes through 515 AM CST... At 437 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grand Prairie, or 7 miles southwest of Morrow, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ville Platte, Palmetto, Bayou Current, Morrow, Whiteville, Big Cane, Goudeau, Dupont, Lebeau and Reddell. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 33 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
